content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mine at position(17.0, 72.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position 17.0, 72.0)

### Furnace at position(18.0, 75.0)
Consists of 
- Stone furnace (position 18.0, 75.0)

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when placing entities too far away from the player position
  - Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance allowed is 10 units.
* Errors when placing entities next to another entity
  - Ensure there is enough space to place the entity next to the target entity. Consider changing the direction or increasing the spacing.
* Errors when inserting items into a furnace
  - Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace.

### NAMESPACE

No functions have been defined by the agent.
